nav.div: Brush School District RE - 2J » News » What's New » Coronavirus Recommendations

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
p.strong: The Brush School District is actively monitoring the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) situation in the United States. The situation is rapidly evolving, and we continue to monitor information from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment (CDPHE).

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

strong.a: Click here for more info: http://bit.ly/brushcoronavirus2020
